00036 namespace TNT

00038 
00039 template <class Array1D>
00040 class const_Region1D;
00041 
00042 template <class Array1D>
00043 class Region1D
00044 {
00045     protected:
00046 
00047         Array1D &  A_;
00048         Subscript offset_;          // 0-based
00049         Subscript dim_;
00050 
00051         typedef typename Array1D::element_type T;
00052 
00053     public:
00054         const Array1D & array()  const { return A_; }
00055 
00056         Subscript offset() const { return offset_;}
00057         Subscript dim() const { return dim_; }
00058 
00059         Subscript offset(Subscript i) const
00060         {
00061 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00062             assert(i==TNT_BASE_OFFSET);
00063 #endif
00064             return offset_;
00065         }
00066 
00067         Subscript dim(Subscript i) const
00068         {
00069 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00070             assert(i== TNT_BASE_OFFSET);
00071 #endif
00072             return offset_;
00073         }
00074 
00075 
00076         Region1D(Array1D &A, Subscript i1, Subscript i2) : A_(A)
00077         {
00078 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00079             assert(TNT_BASE_OFFSET <= i1 );
00080             assert(i2 <= A.dim() + (TNT_BASE_OFFSET-1));
00081             assert(i1 <= i2);
00082 #endif
00083             offset_ = i1 - TNT_BASE_OFFSET;
00084             dim_ = i2-i1 + 1;
00085         }
00086 
00087         Region1D(Array1D &A, const Index1D &I) : A_(A)
00088         {
00089 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00090             assert(TNT_BASE_OFFSET <=I.lbound());
00091             assert(I.ubound() <= A.dim() + (TNT_BASE_OFFSET-1));
00092             assert(I.lbound() <= I.ubound());
00093 #endif
00094             offset_ = I.lbound() - TNT_BASE_OFFSET;
00095             dim_ = I.ubound() - I.lbound() + 1;
00096         }
00097 
00098         Region1D(Region1D<Array1D> &A, Subscript i1, Subscript i2) :
00099                 A_(A.A_)
00100         {
00101 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00102             assert(TNT_BASE_OFFSET <= i1 );
00103             assert(i2 <= A.dim() + (TNT_BASE_OFFSET - 1));
00104             assert(i1 <= i2);
00105 #endif
00106                     //     (old-offset)        (new-offset)
00107                     //
00108             offset_ =  (i1 - TNT_BASE_OFFSET) + A.offset_;
00109             dim_ = i2-i1 + 1;
00110         }
00111 
00112         Region1D<Array1D> operator()(Subscript i1, Subscript i2)
00113         {
00114 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00115             assert(TNT_BASE_OFFSET <= i1);
00116             assert(i2 <= dim() + (TNT_BASE_OFFSET -1));
00117             assert(i1 <= i2);
00118 #endif
00119                     // offset_ is 0-based, so no need for
00120                     //  ( - TNT_BASE_OFFSET)
00121                     //
00122             return Region1D<Array1D>(A_, i1+offset_,
00123                     offset_ + i2);
00124         }
00125 
00126 
00127         Region1D<Array1D> operator()(const Index1D &I)
00128         {
00129 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00130             assert(TNT_BASE_OFFSET<=I.lbound());
00131             assert(I.ubound() <= dim() + (TNT_BASE_OFFSET-1));
00132             assert(I.lbound() <= I.ubound());
00133 #endif
00134             return Region1D<Array1D>(A_, I.lbound()+offset_,
00135                 offset_ + I.ubound());
00136         }
00137 
00138 
00139 
00140 
00141         T & operator()(Subscript i)
00142         {
00143 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00144             assert(TNT_BASE_OFFSET <= i);
00145             assert(i <=  dim() + (TNT_BASE_OFFSET-1));
00146 #endif
00147             return A_(i+offset_);
00148         }
00149 
00150         const T & operator() (Subscript i) const
00151         {
00152 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00153             assert(TNT_BASE_OFFSET <= i);
00154             assert(i <= dim() + (TNT_BASE_OFFSET-1));
00155 #endif
00156             return A_(i+offset_);
00157         }
00158 
00159 
00160         Region1D<Array1D> & operator=(const Region1D<Array1D> &R)
00161         {
00162             // make sure both sides conform
00163             assert(dim() == R.dim());
00164 
00165             Subscript N = dim();
00166             Subscript i;
00167             Subscript istart = TNT_BASE_OFFSET;
00168             Subscript iend = istart + N-1;
00169 
00170             for (i=istart; i<=iend; i++)
00171                 (*this)(i) = R(i);
00172 
00173             return *this;
00174         }
00175 
00176 
00177 
00178         Region1D<Array1D> & operator=(const const_Region1D<Array1D> &R)
00179         {
00180             // make sure both sides conform
00181             assert(dim() == R.dim());
00182 
00183             Subscript N = dim();
00184             Subscript i;
00185             Subscript istart = TNT_BASE_OFFSET;
00186             Subscript iend = istart + N-1;
00187 
00188             for (i=istart; i<=iend; i++)
00189                 (*this)(i) = R(i);
00190 
00191             return *this;
00192 
00193         }
00194 
00195 
00196         Region1D<Array1D> & operator=(const T& t)
00197         {
00198             Subscript N=dim();
00199             Subscript i;
00200             Subscript istart = TNT_BASE_OFFSET;
00201             Subscript iend = istart + N-1;
00202 
00203             for (i=istart; i<= iend; i++)
00204                 (*this)(i) = t;
00205 
00206             return *this;
00207 
00208         }
00209 
00210 
00211         Region1D<Array1D> & operator=(const Array1D &R)
00212         {
00213             // make sure both sides conform
00214             Subscript N = dim();
00215             assert(dim() == R.dim());
00216 
00217             Subscript i;
00218             Subscript istart = TNT_BASE_OFFSET;
00219             Subscript iend = istart + N-1;
00220 
00221             for (i=istart; i<=iend; i++)
00222                 (*this)(i) = R(i);
00223 
00224             return *this;
00225 
00226         }
00227 
00228 };
00229 
00230 template <class Array1D>
00231 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &s, Region1D<Array1D> &A)
00232 {
00233     Subscript N=A.dim();
00234     Subscript istart = TNT_BASE_OFFSET;
00235     Subscript iend = N - 1 + TNT_BASE_OFFSET;
00236 
00237     for (Subscript i=istart; i<=iend; i++)
00238         s << A(i) << endl;
00239 
00240     return s;
00241 }

00244 /*  ---------  class const_Region1D ------------ */
00245 
00246 template <class Array1D>
00247 class const_Region1D
00248 {
00249     protected:
00250 
00251         const Array1D &  A_;
00252         Subscript offset_;          // 0-based
00253         Subscript dim_;
00254        typedef typename Array1D::element_type T;
00255 
00256     public:
00257         const Array1D & array()  const { return A_; }
00258 
00259         Subscript offset() const { return offset_;}
00260         Subscript dim() const { return dim_; }
00261 
00262         Subscript offset(Subscript i) const
00263         {
00264 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00265             assert(i==TNT_BASE_OFFSET);
00266 #endif
00267             return offset_;
00268         }
00269 
00270         Subscript dim(Subscript i) const
00271         {
00272 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00273             assert(i== TNT_BASE_OFFSET);
00274 #endif
00275             return offset_;
00276         }
00277 
00278 
00279         const_Region1D(const Array1D &A, Subscript i1, Subscript i2) : A_(A)
00280         {
00281 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00282             assert(TNT_BASE_OFFSET <= i1 );
00283             assert(i2 <= A.dim() + (TNT_BASE_OFFSET-1));
00284             assert(i1 <= i2);
00285 #endif
00286             offset_ = i1 - TNT_BASE_OFFSET;
00287             dim_ = i2-i1 + 1;
00288         }
00289 
00290         const_Region1D(const Array1D &A, const Index1D &I) : A_(A)
00291         {
00292 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00293             assert(TNT_BASE_OFFSET <=I.lbound());
00294             assert(I.ubound() <= A.dim() + (TNT_BASE_OFFSET-1));
00295             assert(I.lbound() <= I.ubound());
00296 #endif
00297             offset_ = I.lbound() - TNT_BASE_OFFSET;
00298             dim_ = I.ubound() - I.lbound() + 1;
00299         }
00300 
00301         const_Region1D(const_Region1D<Array1D> &A, Subscript i1, Subscript i2) :
00302                 A_(A.A_)
00303         {
00304 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00305             assert(TNT_BASE_OFFSET <= i1 );
00306             assert(i2 <= A.dim() + (TNT_BASE_OFFSET - 1));
00307             assert(i1 <= i2);
00308 #endif
00309                     //     (old-offset)        (new-offset)
00310                     //
00311             offset_ =  (i1 - TNT_BASE_OFFSET) + A.offset_;
00312             dim_ = i2-i1 + 1;
00313         }
00314 
00315         const_Region1D<Array1D> operator()(Subscript i1, Subscript i2)
00316         {
00317 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00318             assert(TNT_BASE_OFFSET <= i1);
00319             assert(i2 <= dim() + (TNT_BASE_OFFSET -1));
00320             assert(i1 <= i2);
00321 #endif
00322                     // offset_ is 0-based, so no need for
00323                     //  ( - TNT_BASE_OFFSET)
00324                     //
00325             return const_Region1D<Array1D>(A_, i1+offset_,
00326                     offset_ + i2);
00327         }
00328 
00329 
00330         const_Region1D<Array1D> operator()(const Index1D &I)
00331         {
00332 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00333             assert(TNT_BASE_OFFSET<=I.lbound());
00334             assert(I.ubound() <= dim() + (TNT_BASE_OFFSET-1));
00335             assert(I.lbound() <= I.ubound());
00336 #endif
00337             return const_Region1D<Array1D>(A_, I.lbound()+offset_,
00338                 offset_ + I.ubound());
00339         }
00340 
00341 
00342         const T & operator() (Subscript i) const
00343         {
00344 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00345             assert(TNT_BASE_OFFSET <= i);
00346             assert(i <= dim() + (TNT_BASE_OFFSET-1));
00347 #endif
00348             return A_(i+offset_);
00349         }
00350 
00351 
00352 
00353 
00354 };
00355 
00356 template <class Array1D>
00357 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &s, const_Region1D<Array1D> &A)
00358 {
00359     Subscript N=A.dim();
00360 
00361     for (Subscript i=1; i<=N; i++)
00362         s << A(i) << endl;
00363 
00364     return s;
00365 }
